h1_content: Yaksha King is one of the Yaoguai Kings you'll need to fight at the end of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. He's the final boss of the Chapter, so expect a challenging fight.
h2_content: This fight will begin immediately after finishing the fight against Red Boy.
promot:
